long_description: The Jones 18L snowboard backpack is big in the right spots so you can carry more into the backcountry. Carry board vertically or use cross-carry system to haul board horizontally against your back for optimal balance and even weight distribution. Side ski carry of splitboard keeps weight close to your back. Front zip pocket accomodates avalanche tools and gear. Zip back entry to main compartment (behind back panel paddling) ensures easy access to your gear, even when your board is attached. Compartment for hydration reservoir (sold separately); insulated shoulder pads prevent frozen hose, providing easy hydration on long treks. Padded hipbelt features a zip pocket on each side; stow snacks and small essentials.
short_description: The Jones 18L snowboard backpack is big in the right spots so you can carry more into the backcountry.
